Name: Escape Memoirs: Mansion Heist
About the game: 'Escape Memoirs: Mansion Heist‚Äù is a co-operative reverse escape-room puzzle game, where you are a master thief hired to break into a mansion. You need to solve various puzzles as you try to complete the heist. You must make good use of your wits if you are to overcome the various challenges you will encounter. Solve Puzzles From deductive reasoning to mechanical devices, wide variety of puzzles await you in the mansion. You will face challenges that will test your logical thinking skills, as you try overcome the many security devices of the mansion. Explore and Discover You will get to explore a beautiful mansion as you try overcome its many trials. During the heist, there will be a lot of opportunities for you to find the many hidden collectibles within the mansion. Work Together Play solo or work together with friends, in up to 5-player multiplayer.
